name: augustly
content:
Add to word list

in a way that suggests great importance or the highest social class: The four-story library stood augustly in the centre of the campus. We were greeted at the museum by the curator, the augustly named Melville Danforth III.
More examplesFewer examplesAn augustly respectable woman, the wealthy widow was widely known as a patron of the arts. A sign at the entrance to the auditorium was augustly emblazoned in gold lettering with the name of the school's longtime drama teacher.
